title: Do Nice Guys Finish Last?
text:
Do nice guys REALLY finish last? It sure seems that way. I consider myself a good and nice guy. It makes me wonder if that is why I'm not married yet. I've heard many women say that they want to meet a nice guy for a change; yet I see them end up with jerks and assholes most of the time. It doesn't make sense to me, but I see it happen more times than not. I guess it just takes that one special woman to feel the same way I do, for it to all come together. I have my life together; I have a good job, my own place, my own car, educated, and well-spoken. I do still have goals that I am working towards achieving and I think that's important. As of right now though, I think the thing lacking most in my life is LOVE.

Instead of telling you the kind of woman I'm looking for; I'm going to tell you the kind of man I am. If you like what you read and feel that I am the kind of guy you're looking for, then we'll go from there.

I'm an old-fashioned guy in many ways. I believe a man should take care of the woman in his life and protect her in any way he can. He should spoil her when ever he possibly can. He doesn't have to buy her expensive gifts. It's more the gesture that counts. I'm the kind of guy to leave you little notes telling you that "I love you" or that "I miss you". I'll buy you flowers on a random day just because. Not because it's your birthday or Valentine's Day. I put a lot of thought into the gifts I buy. It may be something small; but it will have special meaning to both of us. 

I don't need a woman to take care of me. I can take care of myself. But when I find that one special woman, we will take care of each other. Not because we need to, but because we both want to. I'm not the best cook, but I try. I am a neat and organized guy though. No one has ever had to clean up after me. I'm not a slob in any way. I take good care of myself and my appearance. title: Dreamer dude looking for female dreamer...dude?
text:
I've never really been too good at talking about myself, let alone trying to explain what I want in an potential companion; so I'm going to give this my best shot. I'm a 28 year-old dude from southern California. I'm from an area called thousand oaks. It's part of ventura county and odds are you haven't heard of it at all.


As the title suggests, I'm a little bit of a daydreamer. I've spent quite a bit of my life with my head in the clouds or in a good book. As a result of this, I've become somewhat socially awkward and have trouble talking to people unless they're "weird" or "out there", too. People who know me always find it strange that I describe myself as shy/introverted because I'm very talkative once I come out of my shell. Like a lot of people, I'm prone to initial shyness, (even more so when getting to know someone of the opposite sex) but I consider myself to be very outgoing beneath the surface.

Right now, my life is kind of not where I really want it to be. I'm working a shit job while trying to figure out if I want to go back to school and finish up my psych degree or maybe just start over with a clean slate. I enjoy going out and having a good time, whether it's hiking, just driving around or spending nights at home. I like to game in my free time, my current vidya obsessions are TF2 and Minecraft, but I really love classic games like Earthbound, Chrono Trigger, Anachronox and the Fallout series in particular. I don't read that often; I have a huge back log of books that I've bought and read halfway through and haven't had time to finish. They mostly consist of sci-fi, fiction and fantasy. Music is also something I find lacking in my life, but I love most genres except country. If you're like me and worship the ground that Bowie walked on, I will love you forever.

As for what I'm looking for? I'm looking for someone that I can be really great friends with, and then if something is there and we happen to move onto a relationship, that'd be great. I've been single for quite some time and would love to get back into the dating game but having a relationship that doubles as a best friendship is something I admire & value. I want someone who is nerdy and has a bit more of a bubbly personality than I do so that the good vibes will rub off on me and I can be less of a Debbie Downer, too. I want someone that doesn't always feel the need to fit in. I'm definitely not perfect and I never will be, but I'm still me. I don't think that these kinds of "ads" really quantify human chemistry, so if you don't fit this to a t; it's alright! Just be open-minded, enjoy the humor and beauty that life has to offer! Let's rock and roll?

To make sure you're not a bot, plz put dreamer in your subject.

Honestly, I'm a bit nervous and embarrassed even writing this ad. You see, I'm NOT looking for just quick, emotionless or casual sex, because I'm not that kind of guy, but rather need to feel comfortable first with whomever I might later end up getting intimate with. Yes, I am in search of sexual encounters and I'm married, so technically that makes me "unfaithful" (whatever that means in such a non-monogamous culture). But I am also aware enough of my own feelings to know that I'm not looking for a one-night stand. I AM looking for a woman who also has been missing passionate love in her marriage, enjoys being with someone who matches her need for affection and can give herself emotionally to a bond that won't undo either her or my marriage over it.

So I wish to have a romantic, intimate, on-going connection with a married woman, who is (as I am) a happy person at heart, even while looking for a more romantically stimulating and erotically fulfilling love life, but can do so separately and independently from her marriage with a sexually liberal mind-set. Being (otherwise happily) married is required, so we both have the same thing to lose, know equally well how much or little we can realistically expect, how discreet we have to be and how much we need to be able to trust each other with our secret.

I know the chances of finding a perfect woman who is a non-smoker, fair-looking, upbeat & positive and in a similar, erotically-frustrating marital situation as I am, are slim to none, but I have to try. I desire more intimacy than I have at home, but I'm not going to be content with just quick casual sex. I want to get to know you. If that's what you are seeking too, please write, and start to get to know each other. If there is chemistry between us, we can decide how to proceed from there at whatever pace we're both comfortable with.

I am completely open to meeting a woman from ANY race and culture, while I myself am a Hispanic male!

title: "I Seek to Light a PASSIONATE Fire within You!"
text:
Just Words On A Page? 

Did you ever instantly know you were going to 
like and trust someone for a long, long time? 

Maybe you only knew them for a short while but 
it seemed that you had known them your whole life, 
as if there were a timeless connection between 
you. As you read these words and remember those 
amazing feelings, it's good to know that sometimes 
life has a way of making us remember those things, 
right prior to discovering that we can experience 
those feelings again... 

With me...in my experience, it's the kind of 
thing that can't be forced and no essay or words 
can create it. Words and appearances are only 
expressions, the vehicles that contain the essence 
that moves us. It can only happen naturally as the 
expression of an energy between two people, but 
when it does...it's just like that feeling of 
incredible bonding, when all the barriers melt and 
drop way, and two people come together, fused into 
one spiritual essence, the mingling of energies 
feeding one to the other, building and increasing 
and intensifying, mingling into an expression of 
aliveness that words can initiate but never 
capture fully. It has instead to be indulged 
inside your own imagination...dwelled on, 
contemplated, experienced, deep, deep inside you. 

I do not know if you are the kind of person 
that can imagine enjoying that that kind 
connection, with someone wonderful who deeply 
moves you. But if you could envision the 
possibility and feel it opening now before you, 
drawing you irresistibly forward, how powerfully 
could you feel that urge to read on and learn 
more? 

If these words have moved you... 

Then perhaps you are the special, imaginative, 
fun-loving woman for me and perhaps we are already 
on the way to being able to meet and feel a 
special connection; a connection based not just on 
getting what you want, but moving beyond what you 
want into what could deeply fulfill you. 

Me...I am open to that special, adventurous, 
athletic, in-shape woman who can show me she has 
a sense of purpose to her life and a sense of 
humor and play to her soul. A woman, not a girl, 
who is open to new learning, indeed even thirsts 
for it, but also has her own mind. A woman who 
longs to share with someone special; someone who 
will be her friend and lover, partner and 
adventurer, who will make each day together seem 
like the first and each moment together filled 
with that sense of a timeless and indescribable 
connection. 

Do You Remember?? 

Do you remember when you were a little child 
and you went to bed expecting tomorrow to be a 
rainy stormy day? But you woke up the next morning 
and to your delight and surprise, you looked out 
to see a brightly shining sun, and not a cloud in 
the sky? And you realized, "Hey...this day is MINE 
to make happen?" Imagine sharing those feelings 
everyday with someone who truly understands, along 
with the passions only adults can create and 
share. 

More About Me... 

I'm 5' 9" tall, athletically built, smooth headed black man, 
dark eyes and I am very pre-occupied with 
stimulating and intelligent conversation; I believe the greatest adventure is to: 

explore one's passions. I define true passion as 
not just lust in the moment...it's not even when 
you are touched so deeply that you find you give 
all that you have. It's when you are touched so 
deeply you find things coming forth from you that 
you never even knew or imagined could be there. 
Can you feel that.....would be an amazing thing to 
experience with someone?

ME: I'm not a doctor or attorney, I just make enough to support my lifestyle until I find something better. I am also involved 
in the human potential movement, so you'll learn lots 
from me about spirit and mind as well as body! I 
must be with someone adventurous who LOVES to 
learn new things and is longing for an amazing new 
direction. Someone who can decide on her own what 
SHE uniquely finds desirable, magnetizing and 
attractive based on her own deep feelings and 
needs. Not because society would approve. Not 
because her friends would validate it. Not even 
because it is what she is used to or expecting or 
based on seeing her "type" or what is "typical", 
because maybe what is typical hasn't really made 
you very happy in the past. But because she is 
ready...truly ready..for something beyond what she 
really even thought could be possible. Because 
maybe feeling that amazing opening is the link 
between the girl inside the woman, and the woman 
inside the girl. 

What I Like... 

I'm strongly into touching, and intense 
kissing(electricity)...that first, soft brush of 
the lips so soft you're not even sure you're 
kissing yet, and it's as if all the passion..all 
the fire that will be experienced in the 
relationship is enfolded in that one, first, soft, 
special kiss, just waiting to be explored and made 
real. It's that moment where time stands still and 
yet in that one moment, there is an eternity of 
experience to be explored. It makes your knees 
weak and your heart soar and every part of you 
comes...alive...awakened...ready for whatever will 
come next. 

It's That Moment 

It's that moment when you just stop...and look 
deep inside yourself and you are able to push 
aside all the rules and restrictions that hold you 
back...you find that you are free to look at your 
own desires with eyes unclouded by the fears of 
others. You can look deep inside and see that 
special place where you keep all your secrets. 
Inside is what you desire. You can see your 
desires and when you see your desires, you know 
that what you want is right there waiting for you 
to act on your desire. Now, with me...that's quite 
a powerful thing. When you see your desires 
clearly, maybe for the first time, the excitement 
and longing you feel is very strong. The 
excitement of knowing you can fulfill these 
desires and the longing of wanting to share that 
experience with someone who so understands how you 
feel. 

More For You...

I am willing and able to learn from you just 
as I am willing and able to teach you many new 
things. Moving forward together in life, longing 
for this amazing new direction. Feeling totally 
excited with permission to not only be who you 
are, but to totally explore and accept the person 
who is even NOW emerging. 

So if perhaps you are this woman, 21-35, with 
a touch of poetry in her soul (and a bit of a 
naughty mind), then maybe you can feel surprised 
at how much you'd like to meet and learn more. 
Please understand that looks are not enough; I 
truly seek a person with a good, strong philosophy 
of life, a high-self esteem, a sense of fun and 
adventure, a love of life and learning and a great 
imagination(so very important!). Please also have 
a good sense of humor and play, and a love of all 
things sensual(if your skill with your lips 
matches your luck with your looks then maybe we 
already have something amazing in common!) 

Does This Sound Too Good To Be True? 

Sometimes in life, we get hurt and let our 
disappointments or past experiences block us from 
holding out hope...hope that real love with real 
people can be possible. But behind all 
that...behind all the cynicism and hurt...the 
let-downs and the "not quites" is the part and the 
person who believes. The one who believes in love 
and being loved for who you are. As you listen to 
the message that one is telling you right here, 
right now...NOW what do you feel just might be 
possible, if you reach out and make this yours? 

Here Is Your Next Step To Take... 

Got pics? Well...you show me yours, I'll show 
you mine". No pics? Then don't ask! I don't mind 
younger women(21+) and have dated/enjoyed a few, 
but you younger gals, don't write me if you can't 
sustain the excitement; thrilled to be your 
teacher but not looking to be a babysitter! So my 
preference is 27-35, please! (If you're hot and 
flowing with life, a few years older won't matter 
either!) Piqued your interest? Good! How strong 
can you feel that building before you RESPOND AND 
EMAIL ME here, through CraigsList.

Of course, you don't have to email me right 
away; you might want to take a few minutes to feel 
the excitement and anticipation or even read this 
page over a few times before you email me. Then 
you can look back on it and enjoy the satisfaction 
you feel as you look forward to receiving my 
reply!

title: Drama Free & Discreet
text:
Hello there! I'm not going to beat around the bush and tell you I'm some sort of hopeless romantic that enjoys long walks on the beach, cuddling, and thunderstorms. I am a married man that desires a sexual relationship, along with a friendship (I can't sleep with someone I don't enjoy being around). I would like to meet a woman that is easy to talk to, has no problem dealing with a smartass (that's me!), and agrees that this should be a mutual relationship where we both please each other.

I may or may not sleep with a woman the first time we meet because I'd like to get to know you over a couple of drinks to see if we click on both an emotional and physical level. I'm not shallow, but I do need to be attracted to my partner. My description of the perfect affair partner is someone that is married (or can be very discrete), is attractive, has a sense of humor, and is intelligent.

Do I seek anything else from you other than sex? Yes, actually I do. Not an emotional relationship, however, it would be nice if you're also available to go out for happy hour from time to time...I'm not all about sex. I'm a classic example of someone who got married too early; I do love my wife...just looking to add a little spice to it, but not change my current situation. This can be a one-night stand or long term. Stick around and I promise I'll give you plenty in return! If you have a desire to keep this quiet, I'd love to hear from you and make this our little secret.

title: REALITY CHECK
text:
YOU. I have never been more frustrated with any effing man in my ENTIRE life. Yes I am younger than you, but I am closer to your age than a toddler's -- I do have an "entire life". I've had ENOUGH of these ILLUSIONS. You are forcing me to reduce myself to loving an effing PHONE SCREEN. WHERE IS YOUR FACE, I DON'T WANT TO LOVE A DEVICE, IT'S MAKING ME CRY. It's worse than long-distancing someone -- we are IN THE SAME CITY. I am much more red-blooded than these words you keep flinging around. This is NO EXISTENCE worth having.

You have given complacency a whole new meaning. You have found space wherein which to take me for granted, and exploited EVERY square inch of it. My thread has run out, I have always been put on the sidelines by you. I'm not your mom but I thought you were proactive, a responsible communicator, somewhat of a go-getter -- in fact I thought that's something we had in common -- was I wrong in my assessment of you? How busy can you be? I was able to get Elon to meet with my team after nagging him for 13 days -- are you busier than real life ironman? I have asked to meet you so many more times than I can remember -- you know how I know? Because my effing device springs up an alert every effing fortnight -- "See him". And every time I get a depressing "Sorry babe" from you. AND STOP USING 'BABY' AS A WAY TO GET OUT OF IT. I'm not dumb. I'm the most realistic person you'll ever know. And I'm done playing behind these facades. This is not good for our health man. OH AND DON'T EVEN GET ME STARTED on the number of lies you have told me. Go back, contemplate. Because I'm thinking about them now and it's not okay to do that. Is this what I am worth to you?

Get out of the comfort zone. It's a new form of death I'm just not used to. I can't force myself to conform to these stupid websites, not going forwards or backwards, STUCK. Day after day, week after week, month after month. The last time I saw you was last year. Happy new year you frustrating being, I hope you're having fun. Craigslist is the perfect way to create the world's best illusions. I decided over new years that this is just, simply, irrevocably the best way to pollute my brain. I can't scour these places looking for you when I MISS YOU. DON'T FORCE ME TO DO THIS I HATE THESE PLACES I JUST WANNA SEE YOU.

Also I'm frustratingly tired. My persona in Los Angeles is that of a widow/singlemom/hornyprogrammer/overworkedboss, but that doesn't compare to how much of my spirit is lost when we fail. I can deal with life, but I can't deal with not being on a good page with you. Not being on a good page with you trumps all life issues. I HATE DONALD TRUMP for ruining this verb for me. I know for a fact I am not being unreasonable. Put aside all my crazy rants and my mean words and this generic actingoutedness -- what am I asking of you man? Can't you afford me a few words? Why are you forcing me to reduce my expectations of you? Why aren't we on the same side?

You are more important to me than any object or entity. I realized this while I was in a haze of cigarettes and alcohol in some shady bar with men in gold chains on some night between Christmas and New Years. Life doesn't matter if you can't be with people who revolutionize it. Work is a non-issue now, and I'm sorry I thrusted all my responsibilities on your head last year -- make it a reason for us to not see each other -- should have just kept my mouth shut and dealt with it like an adult. The future is irrelevant -- this is what I am, even if it's not perfect; this is what I can do, even if it's not enough. It will take me to a place I deserve, or I'll die or live on the streets. I lived on the streets in 2011 in a third world fucking country, and I can do it again. My point is -- it's time for you to transfer your shit on my head. I want you with me, and I want you to know that you have important-status.

AND I WANT TO BE THERE WITH YOU, so can you open up for eff's sake. I am like a sledgehammer constantly thrusting at you, just to get a tiny glimpse through the cracks. How can that not be tiring for the both of us? Have you forgetten what oxytocin feels like? GET OVER whatever trust issues, ego issues, superlatively analytical thinking, extreme protectiveness of discretion, crazy untrust of technology, absolute taking-for-grantedness-of-the-kid you have because I can't deal with not knowing BASIC facts about you. YOU'RE MAKING IT TOO HARD. I am more human than you realize -- it was a surprise to me too. I bow down, so please. Take it easy on me, take it easy on this.

Also, who is asking you to be all nice and respectful and supportive if you're not interested in sticking around? I'm not a child I can take some harsh truths from you. Even when you break up, you don't curse. Why can't you just give it to me straight? How will I know if I've crossed a line? Tell me you're done and I should stop texting you forever? Or just tell me I'm the biggest cunt in your life and that you hate me? Actually maybe you did try to end it completely and I paraded all over it. If that's the case, you can stop reading now.

Why do you just continue texting if you're not interested in moving forward? Are we going to repeat the same "let's just text meaninglessly for the next half fucking year because you're funny and I'm hot", because if this is the mid-point of 14 months, I can't repeat this process for the next 7 months. Can you? I simply can't text meaninglessly forever -- just hoping you're there somewhere floating in the universe with an effing receiver. I've been trying SO HARD to make myself heard when it comes to this -- have you heard me? Craigslist is a method that is not good to get used to. DIRECT COMMUNICATION. Who says when we evaluate? I say now I'm bored. How are you not bored? When did this become something we have to put up with? When did we start having to make-do with one another? Why are you reading this right now and NOT beside me? Who the eff is stopping us?

If you are interested in sticking around, after this explosive rant-machine of a post, I'm YEARNING FOR progress. Without it, I'd rather die. Seriously. Also, I may be a jerk, but let's get the cards straight. You have your own special, albeit subtle, blend of jerkiness. On the outset you're all nice and "baby", but when it comes to the things that really matter, you deflect. You deflect like no other, and MAN, you don't trust. And that sucks ass. Don't you think life is enough to deal with? Why aren't we using our alliances to strengthen each other? Why can't we be the dyad that revolutionizes life?

I can text and ask you "What are we" and you'll say let's discuss this the next time we meet. That's fine, but then show the fuck up man. Because it matters to me -- it matters to me more than anything. Every atom in your body and every thought in your mind matters to me. I think about you every hour wondering if you're safe. Thinking about you going to unknown places and meeting unknown people makes me want to pull my hair out, and stop everything. Stop all these crazy routines like brushing teeth and going to work because these drives don't COMPARE to the absolute that I want for you. They are meaningless. For every 60 seconds of life, I spend 40 thinking about this. I spend so much time imagining life through you. I wish I had more of an idea. You're everything to me man. Even if we aren't together -- there will never be a day I am not concerned for your well-being. What is this crazy unprofessional behavior? Why are you like an ostrich digging your head in the sand? Just because we haven't confronted it doesn't mean it's just gone. This is why "running away" and ditching becomes so tempting after a given time period -- there's too much backlog shit to deal with.

When we don't talk, we're in free fall.

And you know what, I'd feel better if you just said you're not attracted to me. Or we don't click, there's no future. Because I thought we could have had greatness. I just can't believe behavioral issues and lazy habits and the most mundane things are coming in the way of something that has potential. I thought you hated slacking off. There's nothing I hate more than wasted potential. 

This post has been for your pure pleasure. I am putting aside my rules to get through to you, through channels you are comfortable with. But this is not reality. Alright? Reality is your face in front of my face. 

You should also know that I'm not gonna be around on any of these websites, and for the most part, I haven't been here. Think twice before you post -- who are you talking to? Who are you hoping will listen? I mean, sure, you can reach out to some other cohort or segment or girl or guy -- just saying I'm genuinely not around here anymore. Deceit has had a corrosive effect on my heart that I have had the good fortune to recognize. Transparency is key (I fantasize about running my own company one day, emphasizing the importance of transparency). I will on be around on my phone number, that you have, and I will be around physically. Also I've improved okay. In terms of sticking around, although now I'm just a grade-A nagger. I've genuinely been trying to be better, but it doesn't work when I have zero input from you. We have to straighten this sense of reality. I'm being strict.

Remember, you are free. No obligations. No need to care for anyone's emotions. Clear some room out in your mind, ask yourself what you want. If this cannot be saved, so be it. You have gotta be tired so leave some room for a cool down.

title: My ideal woman
text:
About me section:
This is perhaps one of the most honest ads on Craigslist if I may say so myself : ) I am a 46 year-old single male. I am college educated and work for Corporate America. I have never been married and have no children. I have a great sarcastic sense of humor which is not for everyone. I am very quick-witted and love to laugh. I live alone and have no pets; although, I like dogs. I don't smoke or do drugs. I only drink occasionally. I am 100% STD free and can prove it. I live alone and pay my own bills. I am extremely caring, honest, and compassionate. I have successfully passed two polygraph examinations in the course of my job which is more than what I can say about most guys or even women for that matter who live in this soulless City we call Los Angeles. I don't play mind games and refuse to play the game. I treat people the same way I would like to be treated and wear my heart on my sleeve. However, my kindness should never be taken as a sign of weakness. Honestly is on top of my list. If you are a liar, I will find out so, save us both the time and energy and move on to the next post. A few other noteworthy points about me: I keep a kosher diet so I will best match with someone who also observes a kosher diet or at least is a vegetarian or vegan. Politically I am happy to say I didn't vote for Obama and will be voting for either Ted Cruz or Donald J. Trump in this upcoming election. I understand I live in a Liberal state and this is a deal breaker for many, but yet I am only looking for one quality person to be my true life partner. Additionally, I am not planning on having any kids. If you already have kids or want to have kids in the future, we won't be a good match for each other. I want someone drama free like myself which I can travel with and go on adventures and not worry about anything. I think kids are a blessing and I totally love my nieces and nephews and consider them as my own. 

About you section:
Ideally, you are for the most part the female version of me : )) I am looking for a woman whose smile will melt my heart and I look forward and enjoy spending time with you. You have a high level of integrity, honesty, and compassion. Last but not least, I am looking for someone who has a great sense of humor and a genuine character. Someone who looks great both inside and out; I hope that my ideal match has a balance of spirituality, work, and fun in her life.

Hello, my name is Kyle. I am interested in eventually being in a long term relationship. There is no pressure if things don't hit off between us right away, I am willing to take things slowly as I would like that we get properly acquainted with each other. We can go out to restaurants to have lunch together and maybe, as we get to know more about one another, then we can have dinner together or go see a movie together. As far as any expenses, I will pay for the meals and other activities as having someone to share time and conversation with would be greatly appreciated. I know that this is probably not the traditional personal ad that you may have read, especially on craigslist. I assure you that I am not simply interested in sex, as seems to be the more common ad/posting, but rather a well rounded relationship that can develop into something more meaningful with time. Making you feel uncomfortable in any way is the last thing I would ever wish to accomplish as I want to take things at a pace that is fine for you. I must disclose, to my embarrassment, that I currently live at home with my parents. I am working with my father at his machining company as his chief inspector and computer manager. I graduated from California State University of Los Angeles with a bachelors degree in international business last year. Though I am not much into sports, I do like to travel, even if just in the valley, and meet new people or learn new things. Generally, I like to explore and I would like to be accompanied on any journey, no matter how near by, with someone in which I can share a personal bond and experience. As far as entertainment, I prefer to watch science fiction and comedies but I often prefer combinations of both. (such as the Hitchhiker's Guide to the Galaxy) Some shows I like include the X-Files, Dr. Who , the Big Bang Theory, Family Guy, and Workaholics. I hope it is not a strike against me, as you read this, as I am 420 friendly. I know the general perception of someone who smokes but I am not someone that would fit the stereotype in case you may have a prejudgment on such activities. I am not religious but I don't mind if you have your own beliefs. I like to talk about global and national politics so I like to read articles and watch world news whenever possible. Beyond talking about various topics I do like to more simply be with someone who likes me for who I am and the company we provide each other. Enjoying a movie at the AMC theater or taking a walk through downtown Covina together is more than I could ask for as being with someone who understands me and who genuinely wants to be with me would be fantastic and a great change from not feeling as though I have someone out there with which I can relate and share my life. If so you are interested in getting to know me please send me a message and maybe we could arrange to go on a date sometime soon. I work Monday through Friday from 6 AM to 4 PM but I am free evenings and weekends. I hope to hear from you. Sincerely, Kyle

title: Girls read this and actually give me a chance to date you
text:
(the first part of this ad is an update/rant by me out of frustration that I can't find love)

Here's the deal, I have been single almost a year now and during that time I have gone through many phases of being ready to date again, but at this point I am literally more than ready. I forget the names of my ex girlfriends sometimes and I'm not making that up. 

I've also learned that girls can say one thing and almost always mean another, but I still have no idea what they actually want from me, and that since I am not willing to settle for a girl that I don't really like, it's proven extremely hard for me to even find a girl that will agree to go on a date with me. 

Here's something that is an actual fact, but you probably won't believe me: 350+ girls have messaged me with something nice to say about who I am, what I'm about, or just that I'm cute. Of those 350 I have only been on a date with 4 of those girls, and obviously I'm still here so nothing has happened. 

I mention this because I don't want any girls to message me unless she at the very least wants to be a text buddy and become a support system for me until I find someone. It hurts me more to have a girl say nice things about me to only follow it up with "well have a good life, I hope you find what you're looking for"

I'd like to admit that I do take things personally sometimes and it's something that is hard for me to change because of how I was brought up and the hellish situations I've lived in without anyone for years in my life. I used to think that growing up on my own and being self-sufficient was a good thing because I'd be able to handle everything by myself, but it turns out it's made me hard to get close to. 

I've worked extremely hard for everything I have now. A great job, a college degree with honors, a couple of loyal to the bone friends, I know what I want in life and I know what I love and I show incredible passion for that for which I love. Nobody is able to say I'm not at the very least a trustworthy person, and if my worst flaw is that I try way too hard to be great and make people happy, then I seriously don't think I should be criticized for it so harshly. 

I am a published writer (like actual legit, print published writings where I got paid money for my work. Although I'm not a great editor and when it's informal like this post, I lack in punctuation skills) so the #1 reason why girls stop talking to me is because I text and write novels instead of just blurbs like normal people. I articulate how I'm feeling in an intense romantic, or non-romantic and serious tone as if I'm narrating the thoughts in my head when I think about a girl.

I NEED A GIRL TO TELL ME TO SHUT UP

Seriously, a girl that wants to get to know me will get to know me within 5 minutes if she doesn't hold court and remind me that nobody wants to read a book every time they get a text. 

Also, girls.... QUIT TELLING ME THAT YOU DON'T MIND ME TALKING SO MUCH BECAUSE YOU "LIKE LISTENING". I don't mean to come off rude saying that, but I know what is preventing me from finding love and getting to the point where I can go on a date with a girl. I want a girl to help me slow down, and I also would like a girl to write a lot about herself if she could so I would feel less self-conscious about how much I write. 

-------This is the end of the initial rant and I'd like to sincerely thank you for reading it if you did, and if you think that you want to give this tall cute guy from Kansas a chance to finally find someone to love, please continue reading my original post which is much more interesting and will give you another view of who I am... or at least another chapter in the book of Brandon (which is what I'm now calling the series of Craigslist posts I have on the internet lol).

title: I ain't nobody's bargain
text:

I've had my ups, perhaps more than most, and I've had my downs, and quite frankly, I have no desire to reach out just for the sake of reaching out. I have zero interest in games and fluff. 

The more I type, the less inclined I am to to drone on and on. I feel like if you're even mildly interested to converse further at this point, you'll shoot me an email and we'll go from there. I'm no open book by any means, but what I am is genuine and fully disclosing to those who earn my trust. Hi,

I'm a 53 year-old Caucasian nerd, told I'm cute and that I look younger than my age, looking for a much younger female nerd who is smart, sweet, sane, a little on the fuller side, and who loves her curves as much as her nerd status.

I'm six feet, weigh 197, work out to keep in shape, am clean-cut, with fair skin, short brown hair and blue eyes. I have no tattoos or piercings. I don't smoke and drink only socially, with dinner or when out with friends who are.

I like going to art museums, the theater, comedy clubs, and would love a partner who enjoys the same. I work in healthcare and direct a comedy theater group in Hollywood. I like to go dancing on the weekends, and enjoy an intelligent conversation over dinner with a smart, funny girl.

I'm looking for someone independent and self-sufficient, who wants to have fun doing all the nerd things she usually doesn't get to do with guys on a date. I'd like to correspond before chatting and meeting. 

If you're tired of dumbing your conversation down, clingy or controlling guys, and want a spontaneous partner who appreciates you for your brains as well as your curves, we may be a good fit. Hope you're out there reading this and that I'll hear from you soon. Thank you, and happy President's Day!

title: Love of My Life...? Crazier things have happened.
text:
I am in a unique situation and position in my life...

For the last few years, I have been in a relationship where the traditional gender roles have largely been reversed. I went through a bitter court battle and lost all of my saved income, and most of my possessions. It was an expensive setback that I'm still in the process of recovering from. Nowadays I'm usually freelancing on a number of projects and work from home. This has given me the opportunity to fill the role of the person who cooks, cleans, and takes care of the home. While I have also lived on my own, whenever I've been in a relationship recently I find that it's better to not be the dominant breadwinner.

I'm loving, loyal, I don't cheat, I'm attentive, robustly affectionate, I'm well spoken and know how to carry myself. I just don't think I'm going to ever find myself in the situation of being a rich man. I know this might sound cliche, but is it at all possible to meet someone who is family oriented, relationship minded, and is ready to stop being cheated on, played around with, or having someone treat them like just another girl?

WHAT'S THIS ALL ABOUT

The stability, serenity, and security of having a committed life-partner are, of course, tremendously valuable, desirable and comforting aspects of marriage. The trade-off, of course, is that with regularity and familiarity invariably comes an eventual wearing off of excitement, verve, and the thrilling prospect of experiencing that, which is unknown. Everyone wants stability in his or her lives, and everyone appreciates being loved...but why does it have to be so damn mundane? Once in a while, aren't you ever overwhelmed with the burning curiosity to let it all go...(if only for a brief period of time, and only if you knew you could come back to the humdrum everyday without repercussions...) and experiment with something completely unplanned, unrehearsed, and new? 

WHAT AM LOOKING FOR

I'm looking for a woman who appreciates all of the benefits of a solid relationship, but who also understands from first-hand experience that burning yearning to break free. Someone who may or may not have had an affair before, someone who may or may not be comfortable with the prospect, but who nonetheless has a zeal for life and a willingness to recognize that you live once, and damn if you don't try everything at least one time. At the same time, I'm not looking to liberate anyone from a difficult relationship, to break free and run free into a field of daisies and roses; know that your bread is buttered at home, and have no desire to permanently leave your heart's Chosen One...just have enough healthy curiosity and spontaneity to explore...harmlessly.

title: PASSION? Where did that go?
text:
Hi.

Just sitting around thinking about a word: "PASSION".

We are all so caught up in life's circle. That's the eat, sleep and work cycle that I think we forgot about this word.

Being single, at times I just throw up my hands with frustration when it comes to dating. The texting relationships where you never meet. The untrue stories and photo's that when you do finally get together you ask yourself, "Who was that". 

Wouldn't it just be nice to meet someone who's an adult, a person who's genuine, one that wants to communicate and touch someone's life. Have someone to think about during the day, communicate with, listen to, hold hands with, and have passionate thoughts about for when you are together? 

Butterflies in one's stomach. What happened to feeling these?

I'd love to just spend time with someone who I could look in to their eyes, hold their hand and just feel good about the place we are at. A woman I could hold close, listen to her day, massage her shoulders to relive the stresses of her week or maybe even rub her feet if she wasn't ticklish. Maybe it's going for a walk in the park, sitting on the beach as the waves crash the surf or something as simple as sitting on the couch watching TV.

Maybe someone that would love to escape for a weekend, share some passion, excitement and just touch one another in ways that keep you thinking about them for the rest of the week and beyond.

What ever happened to all of these types of thoughts, values and experiences?

This 42 year old European male who's 6'2" comes with black hair and brown eyes and a medium build who would love to meet someone who's open to exploring this adventure once we both feel comfortable with one another. Identified as "Unique" I'm not only educated but grew up with some old fashioned values, speak, listen and communicate well and possess something that's not seen often. 

"Quality as well and being Genuine" 

I'm a non smoker, drink on occasion in a social setting. Affectionate and caring who works a busy schedule but wants to take time out to be with someone. A business owner who's smart, intelligent and a man with common sense. All part of a northern upbringing from an exceptional family that just doesn't exist anymore due to their passing.

A man that will stand by your side and make you laugh till it hurts. Remember that growing up?

A lover of water, dining, bowling, pool, swimming, movies, music and the most important "Romance". 

Please: no games, no dating sites, no verification sites. I've seen it all on here, heard it all and ask myself why? all the time. Lets just share a photo, a few emails then our phone numbers and meet. Whether it's just an hour or it turns in to 3 hours. It's really the best way in getting to know of your interests.

Till your reply.

Hello everyone. I would really appreciate it if you didn't email me with comments or suggestions. If it's not your cup of tea, please be respectful and just move on. Thank you!

I'm a tall, caucasian, brunette. Semi-long hair and light beard. I am told often that I am handsome. I am 41, but I have been told that I look quite young. I have a high sex drive and I am well endowed. I have an adult son and I am not interested in having anymore children or helping someone raise theirs. I am completely drug free and I do not smoke pot, cigarettes, or vape. I enjoy a nice glass of wine or a cocktail, but keep it light. 

Believe it or not, I do not enjoy casual sex at all. I would like to find someone who can be loyal and honest, but also open minded and adventurous, especially in the bedroom. My previous relationships seemed to end up with very intelligent, fun bi women who loved exploring our sexuality to any length and we enjoyed three ways with other women. I'm not necessarily looking to have three ways, but I realize at this point in my life, I can't be with someone vanilla or afraid of her own body or animal desires. 

So far, it is one of the greatest sensations to be with someone you care about and trust and lose all inhibitions while exploring boundless avenues of sensuality and passion. 

I am very out of the ordinary. Not materialistic at all. I do not care about sports or cars. My closest friends are women and gay men. I am quite masculine, but I find most straight men a bit ridiculous about it. My favorite compliment I received was that I am a Renaissance man. I am a visual artist, musician, poet, and a story writer. I have a day job in Costa Mesa and I live by the beach in Long Beach. I have a deep fascination with other cultures and I plan on traveling a lot eventually. Also, I am very kind-hearted and very affectionate. 

Please do not take offense; this is just a preference. Excessive tattoos and plastic surgery turn me off. I am incredibly attracted to women who just carry themselves naturally. Flaws and all (I even love pubic hair).

I realize that there are a lot of fake people and crazies on here, but I have met some amazing people here that I would never meet anywhere else and I have had some incredible experiences. 

I do not expect to have sex with you if we meet. Just nice conversation and let things happen organically.

title: Exploring reality-physical & metaphysical, & discovering what's hidden
text:
Schopenhauer famously said: "All truth passes through three stages. First, it is ridiculed. Second, it is violently opposed. Third, it is accepted as being self-evident."

If you are the type interested in what they don't teach you in school, both about the world, and yourself, I am the man you want to connect to and become friends with.

"The spirit of inquiry, the search for greater truth beyond religion and science, the profound seriousness of doing real thinking, philosophy and ontology -- these are almost totally lacking in humanity. Humanity is therefore subhuman from lack of genuine intelligence. ... They automatically reject any emergent facts or realities that do not fit their brain dead cognitive pattern of belief and disbelief. They watch too much television".

Let me ad another little quote here: "For example, everyone knows there were saber-toothed tigers and all sorts of big animals 12,000 years ago, and before. But that's were it stops, they don't tell you why they disappeared. Or how.

The reality of it is simple, but it does not fit with what you are supposed to believe, so you aren't told, and will never be. Something like 11,600 years ago, the earth underwent a big catastrophe, probably the result of a cosmic near miss by a huge object. We lost a good chunk of our air, and the reduced air pressure reduced the size of all animals and plants, including humans. All ice melted and the planet got shaken real hard, so everything on it was destroyed, as the seas washed over the land. This included a worldwide civilization, the remnants of which can be found under the sea today, as the sea level rose 400 feet, and they were just like us, 90% of them living on the seasides or nearby. Just go on Youtube and look for "Dwarka". It's as big as Manhattan, 160 feet under sea level, and is 11,600 years old and it was ruled by a king named Krishna, who subsequently became a Hindu god -- unless that was what he was in the first place..."

That's for physical reality. It's the same thing with meta-physical reality. 

Here is another quote: "More or less, everything we are told about most of everything physical or metaphysical is a lie." "In order to grasp the truth, you must use your free will and freedom of thought. Do not let your mind get trapped within the religious or scientific paradigms. Religion and science are simply forms of control that were created by the ruling elite long before you were born. And thus, it is a shame that after being born on this planet, you were raised on either of those two lies."

At any rate, if you want your mind shaken a bit, go to wikiquote.org/wiki/Buckminster_Fuller and just read randomly.

Or, and particularly if questions like these are of interest to you, you can also drop me an email, and let's get to know each other. ;)

Who knows, this might also lead to all sorts of delicious things...

title: Swimming with Banality in very deep waters
text:
It's instructive to look at what online personal ads have become, and to notice the limits to our collective ability to really articulate the things all of us are presumably looking for. The warmness of a genuine relationship, the kindness and trust of another soul, the real human need to have someone there when things go wrong. The delight of sitting around with somebody special on a cold day watching bad movies. Sharing a good meal. Surprising the other with an act of appreciation. Ruminating on all that's good and bad in existence, and knowing the difference. That's the stuff that matters, in the nutshell.

What we have instead is a morphed version of a reality television series. People have been reduced to obvious commodities. What's on display is an appeal to appetites, sexual or fiscal, with only passing regard (or none, most often) for the ephemeral qualities that really allow people to enjoy each other. 

I'm not looking for a commodity. I'm not interested in your buying habits, or your net worth. I am very interested in what you think about, in how you digest the world. And how you treat those in the world around you. I paint and I write, I think about stuff, I am an "intellectual rebel." (or so I've been told). Not garden variety folk.

I'm interested in becoming close with another human being, and to share my life with them. Kindness, honesty, and intelligence are the tickets. Humility rocks as well.

Answer my ad, and we can talk about this and other stimulating stuff. I've got lots of stories and thoughts to share. Oh, I love cats and ruminating on existence :-)

title: Seeking a Love-Realized Woman of Beauty
text:
Looking for a special woman who knows herself as Love, and yearns to give that to a man who knows himself as Love and yearns to give that love back to you. If you put love above all other considerations, as I do, I'd love to hear from you. 

Would like to meet a woman who can walk the sacred path with grace and expanded awareness as opposed to falling pray to unhealed ego/emotional material (the former assumes that you either have had a very loving and peaceful childhood, or that you have done most of your psychological and emotional healing in productive professional contexts). In other words, I am seeking the essential You, which you have actualized, not the conditioned ego shell of you...(abiding union cannot really unfold on that level)! I am really looking forward to exchanging deep affection, sacred love making and play as a continual current (which is our nature), not as an occasional event. Would be beautiful if those led to forming a family, marriage, finding a dream home, and uniting our mutually empowered purpose in areas that are important to us, including global philanthropic and humanitarian work.

So far, every time I meet a woman who has the fragrance of this actualized inner beauty, as well as outer physical beauty, she is married or in a committed relationship... or hear unhealed fears and insecurities sabotage the relationship and make sustained intimacy impossible. Now I am looking for those amazing women that are still single and longing to form a profound union. A fundamental identification with Jesus Christ and an ever-growing actualization of and surrender to his love, and to the love expressed by other saintly beings from different traditions, are essential - so that it may become our nature as well as the sacred fabric that unites our relationship.

Please introduce yourself with a meaningful few sentences or a paragraph. Please attach some recent clear photos of you, preferably professionally taken ones, not selfies. Feel free to ask me any questions or to share your dream of intimacy.

I am an active and vibrant creative professional in my 40's, white, 6.1'/175lb, brown hair/eyes, and seeking ideally a woman in the age range of 20's through mid 30's. Exceptions could be very welcome if compelling. Please be health conscious, drug/cigarette/dog/alcohol(ism)-free and with elegantly and femininely shaped physique.

title: Marriage Minded / Long Term
text:
Hello, 

Ok here's the deal... I'm looking to get married. There I said it! I am 56 years old and I have never been married. I also do not have any children. So before you judge me, I was in a few very long term relationships. I dated and lived with my first live in girlfriend for 12 years. I also dated someone for 5 1/2 years that I was engaged to. So I do not have a commitment phobia. I just wanted to make sure that my relationships did not end in divorce. I think that I had made some bad choices in whom I decided to date. Very hard to admit.


So at this point in my life I have achieved a pretty nice level of success. At 56 I retired last April. I don't consider myself to be super rich however I don't need to look at the right side of the menu when I go out to eat. I own my own home, a vacation home in the mountains, a few cars and don't carry any consumer debt. I have PERFECT credit and pride myself on paying all my bills on time. I am 5' 11" with dark hair and green eyes. A bit heavy for my liking however I do carry my weight well. I would consider myself to be of average looks and appearance. I have a strong personality with humor in the forefront. I have a dog named Roxy that I love very much. She is a 12 pound, 5 1/2 year old mix that is very friendly and everyone just falls in love with her when they meet her. I love to laugh and more importantly I love to make you laugh. I've been told that I am childlike in many ways. But when it comes to my responsibilities I'm very serious and committed. I am always on time, I go to bed early and get up early. I don't smoke and thats a deal breaker if you do. I am a very light drinker and don't do well with big drinkers. I absolutely love travel / vacations as well as nice dinners out. I have been very independent my whole life but would like someone that can help me change that. I've never dated anyone that cooked or did my laundry for me, ever! Sometimes I think it would be nice to be taken care of a little bit. Understand I am willing to return the favor by doing things for you as well. I am a giver by nature and not a taker in any way. I am honest, faithful, respectful and know how to treat you with the respect that you deserve. I have zero interest in controlling another human being. 


What I am looking for... Easy going, kind, considerate, not entitled, a giver like me, an early riser and just a well balanced person. Someone that has good credit like myself, mostly debt free, a non smoker / drug user, funny and most importantly someone that finds my uniqueness attractive and charming. I don't keep in touch with my ex's and unless you have children with someone, I would expect the same. I think that Facebook has been the cause of many divorces. Of course there's that chemistry thing. I would hope to be attracted to you on a deeper level then just looks. Can't explain that one however I'm sure you get my point. 


I know I've written a lot here and that it won't appeal to everyone. However I feel that this is my best chance of finding that one in a million to share my life with. I will send you a picture upon request and I would hope that you send one with your reply. I'm not one to go back and forth with emails so please be prepared to take a chance by getting on the phone and just talk. I feel that so much more ground can be covered in a 5 minute phone call compared to days of emailing back and forth. I'm sure that there is more however we can explore that further when we talk.


I really look forward to hearing from you...

Perhaps a combination of the above?

I've been married now for 7 years and with her for 9. When we first met the sparks would fly but, after a few years our intimacy has taken a constant downward spiral to where I can't conceivably understand how it can go any lower.
